example.eg: Romance questions are beyond the scope of the language forum.
example.egtrans: 浪漫爱情问题不在本语言论坛范围之内。

example.eg: The sniper used his scope to aim his gun.
example.egtrans: 狙击手用瞄准仪来瞄准枪。

example.eg: The manager did not understand the scope of the problem at first, but soon realized its scale.
example.egtrans: 经理起初并不明白该问题的规模，不过很快就意识到了严重性。

example.eg: He looked through the scope and saw the stars.
example.egtrans: 他透过望远镜看到了星星。

example.eg: She scoped the restaurant to find the best table.
We scoped out the restaurant to see if it would be a good place to celebrate Clive's birthday.
The full scope of the crimes they committed in office is finally being revealed.

dsense.name: full scope
dsense.guideword: (opportunity for full use of powers) (施展才能)

example.eg: Congress used the full scope of its powers to change the law.
Students must include only relevant information in their essays and omit anything which is out of scope.
One way of avoiding scope creep is to define the limits of a project very precisely.
If the scope of supply is not complete, the company will send the missing components to the customer.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 供货范围, 供应范围

dsense.name: scope of work
dsense.guideword: (nature and extent of a job or task)

example.eg: The scope of work for a project should specify precisely what work will be done.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 工作内容, 工作范围
